section.heading: Applicability of provisions — Taxable years.
section.text: The provisions of this chapter shall apply to the taxable year or part thereof beginning on the 1st day of January 1947 and to succeeding taxable years.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 331, ch. 258, art. I, title I, § 2
